Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its advanced features and high-quality materials, it's truly a remarkable item. Considering its exceptional value and capabilities, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you can acquire this product for $145. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience the benefits firsthand. If you're interested, please let me know, and we can proceed with the purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $145. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $145
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $150
